attributes.action: To Bring back the Death Penalty for Child Murders and Abusers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to see the death Penalty reinstated for ALL child Murders, sex offenders against children and child abusers, what happened to Baby P cannot be allowed to continue to happen to our children, not to mention Victoria Climbie and James Bulger. Some sort of deterrent is needed NOW.

rejection.details:
There are several petitions altready in existence:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/BabyPEnquiry/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
